edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.features

Class FeatureCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.features.FeatureCalculator

  • public class FeatureCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calculates longitudinal features of each cluster and stores them in the database.
    Author:
    Chris Neasbitt

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDomainsPerNetwork

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> calculateDomainsPerNetwork(java.util.Date log_date,
                                                                           int window)
                                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Calculates the domains per network feature for each cluster generated on a specific run date.
        Parameters:
        log_date - the run date
        window - the number of days previous to use in feature calculation
        Returns:
        a table of values where the keys are cluster ids and the values are the feature values
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error calculating the feature values

      • calculateNoveltyFeature

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> calculateNoveltyFeature(java.util.Date log_date,
                                                                        int window)
                                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Calculates the cluster novelty feature for each cluster generated on a specific run date.
        Parameters:
        log_date - the run date
        window - the number of days previous to use in feature calculation
        Returns:
        a table of values where the keys are cluster ids and the values are the feature values
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error calculating the feature values

      • calculatePrevClusterRatios

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.Double>> calculatePrevClusterRatios(java.util.Date log_date,
                                                                                                 int window)
                                                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Calculates the previous cluster ratio feature for each cluster generated on a specific run date and within the a specific window
        Parameters:
        log_date - the run date
        window - the number of days previous to use in feature calculation
        Returns:
        a table of results, the keys of the table are cluster ids and the values are lists of two elements. The first element is the last_growth_ratio_prev_clusters value and the second element is the last_growth_prefix_ratio_prev_clusters value
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is and error calculating the feature

      • getPrevDates

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Date> getPrevDates(java.util.Date log_date,
                                               int window)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets run dates previous to a specific date within a window of days from that date.
        Parameters:
        log_date - the run date
        window - the number of days previous to the current date
        Returns:
        the list of previous run dates
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error retrieving the previous run dates

      • updateDomainsPerNetwork

        public void updateDomainsPerNetwork(java.util.Date log_date)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the domains per network feature for each cluster generated on a specific run date and stores them in the database.
        Parameters:
        log_date - the run date
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an error calculating or storing the feature values

      • updateFeatures

        public void updateFeatures(java.util.Date log_date)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates each cluster's longitudinal features for all clusters generated during a specific run date.
        Parameters:
        log_date - the run date
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unable to calculate or store the longitudinal feature values
